extendedInfo.description: Instantly share your location with friends, partners and colleagues. Let them know where you are! Track and share your GPS location and explore points of interest around you.â 1. POSITION / SHARE âThey will receive an e-mail or SMS with your current address and a link to Google Maps. On Android and iPhone they can open this link directly in the Google Maps app and use it as the destination for driving directions.You can always check and edit the message before sending. With 'One Touch Location' kids can update their parents, partners each other, and friends can use it to find each other.â 2. TRACK âTrack your location continuously on your personal One Touch Location profile page. Simply send a link to your friends and they will know where you are on the move. Use it in the city, on the mountains or on the road - GPS tracking that simply works!â 3. EXPLORE (NEW IN VERSION 3) âDiscover points of interest that match your interests around you while you are on your way. Perfect, if you are new in a city and looking for cafÃ©s or galleries for example.â POSITION / SHARE Features:â Uses GPS or network location providersâ Shows current address, which can be copiedâ Send address, GPS position and link via e-mail or SMSâ Facebook integration: Publish directly to Facebookâ Add comment to Facebook post (pro only)â Share location on social networks like Twitterâ Define quick access contactsâ Up to five quick access contacts (pro only)â Set custom e-mail subject, CC and BCC (pro only)â More accurate location (pro only)â Let the app speak the addressâ Switch position display (degrees/decimal) (pro only)â TRACK Features:â Cloud based & real-time GPS trackingâ Your track is accessible online on your personal tracking profileâ Access protection - you decide who can see your locationâ Fixed update interval of 5 minutesâ Define the tracking interval from 5 minutes to 6 hours (pro only)â Your track will be visible for 6 (free) or 24 (pro) hoursâ Personalize your tracking profile (pro only)â Google maps integrationâ GPX and KML export (pro only)â EXPLORE Features:â Search for points of interest in a background serviceâ Get notified instantlyâ Enter up to three search terms (pro only)â Worldwide places databaseâ Facebook, Google Maps and Foursquare integrationThe app is a perfect companion for- hikers, mountain climbers and campers,- runners and cyclists,- bikers,- children, kids and teenagers,- field staff and drivers,and everyone else who wants to send location traces. Sharing your location with Facebook friends with âOne Touch Locationâ is much easier than with Foursquare, Glympse, or similar apps - no need to register or log in. If you used Google Latitude you will find One Touch Location a useful GPS tool too.âââ One Touch Location: Share - Track - Explore âââFree app to share and track your location and explore the world around you! Visit the official homepage at: http://onetouchlocation.creativeworkline.com----We â¥ to get feedback from our customers. If you have an issue or suggestion, please send us an e-mail to support@creativeworkline.com. We cannot respond to you for more information if you post your issue in the comments of the Play store.

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Its ok, nice it works across Apple & android.  But would be better if you could set it to launch automatically when phone starts.
reviews.author: Neil Forster

reviews.title: Good app, but not worth buying Pro
reviews.comment: I liked the app until I bought the Pro license. All it enabled me to do was put in my name, email address, gave me an access code (which I don\'t know where or how to use) and the ability to change the tracking interval from 10 mins, to a number of other choices. Nearly $3 for enabling 2 textboxes and 1 drop down is not worth it.  Go for the free version. I\'m asking for my money back!  The free version gets a 4, but for $3 and 3 additional options, it just lost 3 stars. 1-star for the Pro version.
reviews.author: Ravi Warrier

reviews.title: Nice app but...
reviews.comment: Is there a way for me to share a specific location as opposed to my current location?
reviews.author: SW Burger

reviews.title: AWESOME APP
reviews.comment: BUY THE PRO VERSION! IT\'S PHENOMENAL... Can\'t you guys see... I am shouting with praise.for this app! :-)
reviews.author: Brian Michael Monteblanco-Garcia

reviews.title: Excellent! This is what I was looking for!
reviews.comment: Other GPS apps require the monitoring user to have the other app installed on their phone, which I find stupid. With this one, you can send the link to anyone you like, and they just click it and they\'re watching your last checkpoint (I\'m upgrading to Pro just for the 5 minute update and the 24hr history). Other apps\' waypoint trail only lasts for 10 minutes so OneTouch is great. Props!
reviews.author: Zuriel Briones

reviews.comment: Simple and useful app.

reviews.title: Poor accuracy
reviews.comment: Galaxy Note 2.   At 48 metres accuracy it is not much use to me .. plus it refuses to give me even the street name, let alone the number. Based on that, I don\'t see the reason for even considering the pro vesion.
